description: This file defines the interface for the DobbyContainer management within the WPEFramework plugin. It declares the DobbyInterface class with methods for container lifecycle management, information retrieval, and event handling, as well as private members related to proxies, listeners, and event handlers.
external_methods: // Placeholder for actual external methods in included headers

classes.name: DobbyInterface
classes.description: A class providing an interface for managing Dobby containers, including methods to initialize, terminate, control container states, and handle container events within the WPEFramework plugin.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Initializes the DobbyInterface with an event handler.

methods.name: terminate
methods.description: Cleans up resources used by DobbyInterface.

methods.name: listContainers
methods.description: Retrieves a list of container IDs.

methods.name: getContainerInfo
methods.description: Fetches detailed information about a specified container.

methods.name: getContainerState
methods.description: Obtains the current state of a specified container.

methods.name: startContainer
methods.description: Starts a container with the provided parameters.

methods.name: startContainerFromDobbySpec
methods.description: Starts a container based on a Dobby specification.

methods.name: stopContainer
methods.description: Stops a specified container, optionally forcefully.

methods.name: pauseContainer
methods.description: Pauses a running container.

methods.name: resumeContainer
methods.description: Resumes a paused container.

methods.name: hibernateContainer
methods.description: Hibernates a container with given options.

methods.name: wakeupContainer
methods.description: Wakes up a hibernated container.

methods.name: executeCommand
methods.description: Executes a command inside a container.

methods.name: annotate
methods.description: Adds an annotation key-value pair to a container.

methods.name: removeAnnotation
methods.description: Removes an annotation key from a container.

methods.name: mount
methods.description: Mounts a filesystem source into a container at the specified target.

methods.name: unmount
methods.description: Unmounts a filesystem from the container.

methods.name: onContainerStarted
methods.description: Event handler called when a container starts.

methods.name: onContainerStopped
methods.description: Event handler called when a container stops.

methods.name: onContainerStateChanged
methods.description: Event handler for container state changes.

methods.name: onVerityFailed
methods.description: Event handler for verification failures.

ctags.name: mEventListenerId
ctags.pattern: /^            int mEventListenerId; \/\/ Dobby event listener ID$/
